name: ZombieVision
description:
Don't just think it. ... Scan them!

Use your iPhone camera to scan your friends or coworkers! Find out who is about to turn!

Customize the scanner sounds and alarm sounds, and more.

Watch reactions as alarms go off! "Danger!, Warning!, Zombie!" Add FX (blood, wounds, and dark Zombie-eyes, tint, adjustments) and save.

View them in ZombieVision's Gallery. Share them in the website gallery! (And share them from Photos®!)

Just pure ZombieVision love!

Don't leave home without it.
